name: Suggestion for level progression of a Monk, Ranger, Champion of Torm on WoG
author: eburro6416

posts.author: eburro6416
posts.content:
Hello all!

I have never made a build before so im not super sure how to go about this. What I am looking for is maximum number of attacks per round with as much AC and AB as I can get. I chose monk because it is my favorite class to play. I was thinking of doing a Dex based Kama monk and Wis based as well so that I can benefit from the no max dex of robes and the monk AC. I was thinking Ranger because they can maintain a decent AB bonus and they get two weapon fighting for free. I also chose Champion of Torm for saves and a little bit of spell casting. But I would like to not worry to much about spell casting and just be able to hold my own against most think as much as I can. I believe max enchantment on WoG is +6. There is no alignment changes and no race restrictions either. Also I want to use Kamas.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: I recommend Fighter instead of Ranger to get your dual-wielding feats and WS / EWS, too.  CoT does give you better saves, but not spell casting.
